long_desc.thetext:
A core value of R4E is to be able to communicate Anomalies and comments of created anomalies. The current implementation does not offer a mechanism to trigger e-mails per each new anomaly or comment.
Proposal:
* Add context menu to anomalies and comments (or any review element) to send an e-mail with its contents * The above should allow for multiple selection, so more than one description is included in the e-mail * A context menu shall be added to Comments i.e. "reply", this reply action would create a new comment with the content of the previous comment marking each line with the ">" character as well as with a header identifying the previous comment e.g. author and date. * The comments shall be sorted by date (not alphabetically)

>> Add context menu to anomalies and comments (or any review element) to send an e-mail with its contents Already implemented with single element selection
>> The above should allow for multiple selection, so more than one description is included in the e-mail implemented
>> A context menu shall be added to Comments i.e. "reply", this reply action would create a new comment with the content of the previous comment marking each line with the ">" character as well as with a header identifying the previous comment e.g. author and date. refer to bug347502 for followup on this one
>> The comments shall be sorted by date (not alphabetically) implemented
Sebastien, please always set the target milestone when resolving bugs to track changes that appear in releases.
